answers.answer: Cortisone is well known for raising BG.  they should have warned you about that.  Pain can also raise BG, so can infections and of cores carbs.

question: I have Type 2 Adult Diabetes . Controlling with RX. I had a shot in my back for Pain. it Raised My Blood Sugar Level for 2 Days then Normal Readings. What was the Cause?
title: Injection
